casebody.data:
VANDERVEER CROSSINGS v. PALMER. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. June 4, 1909.) Appeal from Special Term, Kings County. Action by Vanderveer Crossings against A. Judson Palmer. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendant appeals. Reversed, and new trial granted.

Argued before WOODWARD, JENKS, GAYNOR, RICH, and BURR, JJ.

Charles C. Suffren, for appellant. Charles C. Clark, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment reversed, and new trial granted, costs to abide the final award of costs, on the authority of Vanderveer Crossings v. Rapalje (decided herewith) 117 N. Y. Supp. 485.
